thread.title: Alexander Skarsgard & More Stars Continue to Support Women's March Causes with This Tee!
thread.title_full: Alexander Skarsgard & More Stars Continue to Support Women's March Causes with This Tee!

author: Just Jared
title: Alexander Skarsgard & More Stars Continue to Support Women's March Causes with This Tee!
text:
Alexander Skarsgard is showing his support for the Womenâ€™s March , which happened last week around the world, by wearing a commemorative tee from the march!
The t-shirt is currently for sale on Represent.com and 100% of the proceeds will be going to the organizations ACLU, Animal Legal Defense Fund, Center for Biological Diversity, Committee to Protect Journalists, the Human Rights Campaign, IFAW, Oceana, Planned Parenthood, the Sierra Club, and 350.org. 
Celebs who were at the march and posed with the shirt include Miley Cyrus , Natalie Portman , Vanessa Hudgens , Mandy Moore , James Franco , Anjelica Huston , Frances Fisher , Helen Hunt , Jamie Lee Curtis , Juliette Lewis , Yvette Nicole Brown , and more!
Go get your shirt before the campaign ends on February 3.
